law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 389, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 37, effective July 1, 1978; and ch. 155, sec. 124, effective June 17, 1978; and ch. 305, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 24(11); and ch. 241, sec. 1. -- Amended 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, Art. X, sec. 8. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 201, sec. 1.
